statements: DELETE FROM BrandTrends WHERE brand_id = 123 AND trend_category = 'Tech';
DELETE FROM BrandTrends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%innovative%' AND consumer_preference = 'Highly satisfied';
DELETE FROM consumer_preferences WHERE consumer_id = 100 AND sustainable_materials = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Purchase WHERE quantity < 5 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Consumer WHERE location = 'New York' OR age > 30;
DELETE FROM Product WHERE price > 100 AND category = 'Electronics';
